content: Name one type of layer used in neural networks that is commonly used in deep learning models and requires a specialized hardware accelerator, such as a GPU or TPU, to be efficiently trained due to its high computational complexity.

One type of layer commonly used in deep learning models that requires specialized hardware accelerators like GPUs or TPUs for efficient training due to its high computational complexity is the **Convolutional Layer**. Convolutional layers are fundamental components of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), which are extensively used for image and video processing tasks. These layers involve a large number of operations, such as convolutional operations and backpropagation, which are computationally intensive and benefit significantly from the parallel processing capabilities of GPUs or TPUs.
